00004     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation, ValueNotSet, WrongType)

00006     checkStarted();
00007     const RDK2::Object* obj = getObjectLC(url);
00008     if (!obj) throw ValueNotSet("Property '" + url + "' is not set (3)");
00009     const T* t = dynamic_cast<const T*>(obj);
00010     if (!t) {
00011         T a;
00012         throw WrongType("Wrong object class for property '" +
00013             url + "' (it is " + obj->getClassName() + ", you want " + a.getClassName() + ")");
00014     }
00015     return t;
00016 }

00062 template<typename T>
00063 vector<const T*> Session::queueFreezeAs(CUrl url)
00064     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation)
00065 {
00066     checkStarted();
00067     vector<const T*> r;
00068     const vector<const RDK2::Object*> v = queueFreeze(url);
00069     for (uint i = 0; i < v.size(); i++) {
00070         const T* t = dynamic_cast<const T*>(v[i]);
00071         if (t) r.push_back(t);
00072     }
00073     return r;
00074 }

00090 template<typename T>
00091 const T* Session::queueLastAs(CUrl url)
00092     throw (NoSuchProperty, InvalidOperation, WrongType)
00093 {
00094     checkStarted();
00095     const RDK2::Object* obj = queueLast(url);
00096     if (!obj) throw InvalidOperation("Queue had a null object (boh)");
00097     const T* t = dynamic_cast<const T*>(obj);
00098     if (!t) {
00099         T a;
00100         throw WrongType("Wrong object class for property '" +
00101             url + "' (it is " + obj->getClassName() + ", you want " + a.getClassName() + " (5))");
00102     }

00106 template<typename SimpleType, typename RType>
00107 SimpleType Session::getValue(CUrl url)
00108     throw (InvalidOperation, NoSuchProperty, WrongType, ValueNotSet)
00109 {
00110     Property* p = getProperty(url); // this throws InvalidOperation and NoSuchProperty
00111     Profiler::lock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00112     p->lock(HERE);
00113     if (!p->getObjectL()) {
00114         p->unlock();
00115         Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00116         throw ValueNotSet("Property '" + url + "' is not set.");
00117     }
00118     const RType* rt = 0;
00119     try {
00120         rt = p->getObjectAsLC<RType>(); // this throws WrongType
00121     }
00122     catch (const SessionException& e) {
00123         p->unlock();
00124         Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00125         throw(e);
00126     }
00127     if (!rt) {
00128         p->unlock();
00129         Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00130         throw InvalidOperation("Something strange in getting the object of property '"
00131             + url + "'");
00132     }
00133     SimpleType st = (SimpleType) *rt;
00134     p->unlock();
00135     Profiler::unlock((sessionName + ":" + url).c_str());
00136     return st;
00137 }
